thread.title: Chris Cornell adds Houston to acoustic tour
thread.title_full: Chris Cornell adds Houston to acoustic tour

author: Joey Guerra, Houston Chronicle
title: Chris Cornell adds Houston to acoustic tour
text:
Chris Cornell adds Houston to acoustic tour By Joey Guerra Updated 12:15 pm, Monday, October 5, 2015 Photo: For The Houston Chronicle Image 1 of / 5 Close Image 1 of 5 
Chris Cornell of Soundgarden performs at the Cynthia Woods Mitchell Pavilion Saturday Aug. 16, 2014.(Dave Rossman photo) Photo: For The Houston Chronicle Chris Cornell of Soundgarden performs at the Cynthia Woods Mitchell... Image 2 of 5 
Chris Cornell of Soundgarden performs at the Cynthia Woods Mitchell Pavilion Saturday Aug. 16, 2014.(Dave Rossman photo) Photo: Dave Rossman, File Chris Cornell of Soundgarden performs at the Cynthia Woods Mitchell... Image 3 of 5 
Chris Cornell of Soundgarden performs at the Cynthia Woods Mitchell Pavilion Saturday Aug. 16, 2014.(Dave Rossman photo) Photo: For The Houston Chronicle Chris Cornell of Soundgarden performs at the Cynthia Woods Mitchell... Image 4 of 5 
Soundgarden's Chris Cornell performs at the Bayou Music Center Friday May 24, 2013.(Dave Rossman photo) Photo: For The Houston Chronicle Soundgarden's Chris Cornell performs at the Bayou Music Center... Image 5 of 5 
Chris Cornell of Soundgarden performs at the Cynthia Woods Mitchell Pavilion Saturday Aug. 16, 2014.(Dave Rossman photo) Photo: Dave Rossman, File Chris Cornell of Soundgarden performs at the Cynthia Woods Mitchell... Chris Cornell adds Houston to acoustic tour 1 / 5 Back to Gallery 
Chris Cornell, best-known as the voice behind Soundgarden, has solo sights set on Houston. 
The grunge hero's acoustic tour comes to town Nov. 7 at Cullen Performance Hall at the University of Houston. Cornell is touring behind new album "Higher Truth." 
Tickets go on sale at 10 a.m. Friday via livenation.com and ticketmaster.com. 
Cornell is working on a new Soundgarden album. His other bands include Audioslave and Temple of the Dog. Entertainment News
